channel.title: [317]Eli3scape PK V2 *Turmoil+SoulSplit* *Never before seen Minigame+more!*
channel.description:
Hey guys, This is my new project. Worked on it for over a year! It has done of special features unseen to any other servers.
There are Rockfish(The new Runescape Food, correct Inventory models on them also+Correct Action). Turmoil, SoulSplit, Deflect Meele, Deflect Range, Deflect Mage and Sap Spirit. All 100% working, correct prayer draining also.
NO STUPID CUSTOMS! all the items in game are from runescape, nothing other the runescape items. But the best part is we have Chaotic maul, Vesta, Statius, Morgans and Zuriels. Vesta's Longsword and Statius Warhammer have the correct specials from runescape.
Here is a List of the Features: - 100% Pk foloing - 100% Magic(Ancients, Lunar and Normal). - 100% Veng + Veng other plus GFX. - Great New pk Point System. - Chaotic Maul + New Pvp Armor and Weapons. - Correct Special + GFX on the appropriate weapons. - Perfect Pking. - Real D claws Spec, 100% like runescape. - Overload, + Extreme Pots(Correct Stat Boosting). - Turmoil + All new chaos Prayer, all new prayer emotes and head icons. - All new custom Minigame Death Trap, Great PKing - New donator Zone + Donator Items, Donator Icons.
- TONS MORE INGAME, CHECK IT OUT! -
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/deathtrap.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/home.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/KBD.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/multi.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/Skilling.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/allnewprayers.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/barrows.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/dclaws.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/aquikzebra/woot3dx2.jpg[/img]
*

item.title: [317]Eli3scape PK V2 *Turmoil+SoulSplit* *Never before seen Minigame+more!*
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

You can’t just say that, without trying it.

We added a totally new pvp system. I will give you all the details.

Offensive:
You are using an Abyssal Whip. (Slash weapon)
Your Attack Level is 117. (Super Attack Potion)
Your Slash attack bonus is 100.
You are using Turmoil, which does NOT boost your accuracy.

Attack Level + Slash attack bonus = 217.

Defensive:
Opponent’s Defense Level is 125. (Ex. Defense Potion)
Opponent’s Slash defense bonus is 350.
Your opponent is using Piety, which boosts their defense by 25%.

Defense Level + Slash defense bonus = 475
475 + 25% = 593.75, which rounds up to 594.

Random Generation:
The server picks a random number between 0 and 217 to decide your accuracy for that attack.
The server picks a random number between 0 and 594 to decide your opponent’s defense for that attack.

If the randomly generated offensive number for the attacker was higher than the randomly generated number for the defender, then the attack dealt damage.
Otherwise, it did not deal damage.

Since 217 is about 36% of 594, then there is a 36% chance that the attack will deal damage, and a 64% chance that they will miss.

Don’t talk, before you know wat was done, Thanks

Read full topic
